text: I went to Watson being unsure of some products I want to get but had a pleasant encounter with Dores who made sure all my questions were answered. Her warm smile and positive attitude made it very welcoming !

Watsons at Marina Link Mall was excellent they have everything what we needed.  I love the Watsons staffs especially Madam Doris and her colleagues they always helping me find the things that I need. Thank you for the Very Friendly staffs. xoxo   5 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
I’ve been there multiple times. Staff will help you find the things you need, and most of the time pretty friendly! Quite some stuff there too!
Located near WOLF inside MBLM. It is on the right side of the T - junction
Pleasant and effective trip at Watsons during busy lunch period. Thanks to the staff
